details:
adjective
- not easily explained
= example: not easily explained
- not divisible by two
= synonyms: uneven
- an indefinite quantity more than that specified
= example: an indefinite quantity more than that specified
- not used up
= synonyms: leftover, left over, left, remaining, unexpended
- beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
= synonyms: peculiar, singular, curious, rum, rummy, funny
- of the remaining member of a pair, of socks e.g.
= synonyms: unmatched, unmated, unpaired
